title: Sodium acetate solution
original description: Sodium acetate solution is used in DNA extraction. This recipe makes 50 mL of a 3 M stock solution at ph 5.2  -- dilute tenfold in water to a working concentration of 0.3 M for use in the DNA extraction protocol.
steps:
None
1. Dissolve 12.3 g of Sodium acetate (anhydrous) in ~ 40 mL MilliQ water. 
12amount 
reagents
2. Adjust pH to 5.2 with glacial acetic acid
3. Make up to 50 mL with MilliQ water  
reagents
4. Dilute an aliquot of the 3 M stock solution to 0.3 M for use in the DNA extraction protocol.
